short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Select text to instantly query AI. Launch searches in ChatGPT/Perplexity. Add custom prompts to speed up research via shortcuts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform any text selection into an AI-powered insight with a single keyboard shortcut. This lightweight extension seamlessly connects your browser to ChatGPT and Perplexity, eliminating tedious copy-paste workflows.

Send highlighted text directly to your preferred AI assistant with customizable prompt templates. Perfect for students analyzing texts, researchers gathering insights, writers seeking feedback, or anyone needing quick translations.

Skip the manual workflow of copy-pasting and let pastePrompt handle the heavy lifting. Zero interface clutter, pure functionality - just highlight and search. Whether you're analyzing documents, translating content, or conducting research, this extension keeps you focused on what matters most - getting answers.
